properties.entry: SELECT DISTINCT sc_product.*,sc_product_flow_details.DAY_PAGEVIEWS, sc_sale_competition.FM_NUM,sc_sale_competition.NM_NUM,sc_sale_competition.UM_NUM, sc_sale_fba.FBA_NUM,sc_sale_competition.TARGET_PRICE, sc_sale_potential.REVIEWS_NUM,sc_sale_potential.QUALITY_POINTS, (SELECT spi.local_url FROM sc_product_imgs spi WHERE spi.asin = sc_product.asin LIMIT 0,1 ) AS LOCAL_URL FROM sc_product LEFT JOIN sc_sale_competition ON sc_sale_competition.asin = sc_product.asin LEFT JOIN sc_sale_fba ON sc_sale_fba.asin = sc_product.asin LEFT JOIN sc_sale_potential ON sc_sale_potential.asin = sc_product.asin LEFT JOIN sc_product_flow_details ON sc_product_flow_details.asin = sc_product.asin where 1=1 {@ and sc_product.title like '%#title#%'} {@ and sc_product.asin = '#asin#'} {@ and sc_product.asin in ( select sc_product_filter_details.asin from sc_product_filter_details where sc_product_filter_details.status in (5,7) ) and 1=#unAsin# }
SELECT sc_supplier.* , ( select sc_user.name from sc_user where sc_user.login_id = sc_supplier.creator ) as USERNAME FROM sc_supplier where 1=1 {@ and name like '%#name#%'}
